title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior Software Engineer to join our dynamic team.¬†The ideal candidate will have a strong background in full stack development, with expertise in building and maintaining web applications using technologies such as Node.js, React.js, TypeScript, JavaScript, Cypress, MongoDB, designing and developing high\\-quality technical solutions using Terraform, AWS services and best practices in Networking and IAM.
 



  





  





 The ideal candidate should have a strong background in AWS services including IAM best practices, AWS API Gateway, AWS Lambda, and AWS S3 The Software Engineer is responsible for the design, creation, testing and documenting of new and innovative software products. This will be in accordance with agreed development and security standards and processes and with support from Senior and Principal Engineers.
 



  





 The candidate will have a passion for technology and technology trends within the field of Software Engineering. The candidate will be an inquisitive learner, and seek to add value to the team immediately, while broadening their knowledge over time. The candidate will already have solid foundational knowledge, with demonstrable experience of building and supporting new products.¬†
 



  





 As a Full Stack Senior Software Engineer, you will play a key role in the design, development, and deployment of innovative solutions to meet our business needs.
 



 ¬†
 



**Responsibilities** 



* Design, develop , test and deploy responsive web applications and scalable mobile applications (iOS \\& Andriod)
* Takes technical responsibility across all stages and iterations of software development. Adopts and adapts appropriate software development methods, tools and techniques. Measures and monitors applications of project/team standards for software construction including software security.
* Responsible for contributing to the efficiency of Product Engineering‚Äôs full software development lifecycle, utilising modern trends and approaches to ensure value is released early and often (Continuous Deployment).
* Leads simple refinement activities of small to medium\\-sized well formed and understood product features ‚Äì partnering with Product and Design to break down these items of work into iterative releases of value to the customer.
* Designs software components and modules using appropriate modelling techniques following agreed software design standards, patterns and methodology. Creates and communicates multiple design views to identify and balance the concerns of all stakeholders of the software design. Identifies and evaluates alternative design options and trade\\-offs. Recommends designs which consider target environment, performance, security requirements and existing systems.
* Works together with the Tech Lead\\- Principal Architect to define the standards on code structure and quality we employ, and owns/reports on parts of that standard.
* Build and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code using best practices.
* Provides feedback to others on code structure and style, regularly reviewing other engineers‚Äô code as a mechanism for learning and ensuring code quality within the codebase remains high.
* Provides and maintains technical documentation for new and existing solutions as a resource for colleagues within Product Engineering.
* Troubleshooting and debugging production issues and providing timely resolution of software defects.
* Contributes to all stages and iterations of the software development lifecycle. Adopts and adapts appropriate software development methods, tools and techniques. Measures and monitors applications of project/team standards for software construction including software security.
* Forge close partnerships with product managers, business analysts, and stakeholders.
* Stay up\\-to\\-date with the latest trends and technologies in web development.



  





**Specific Skill based Deliverables:** 




  




* Designing, developing, and maintaining full stack applications using Node.js, React.js, TypeScript, and JavaScript to meet business requirements.
* Building efficient and reusable front\\-end systems and components in React.js with a focus on performance optimization.
* Writing server\\-side logic using Node.js and integrating user\\-facing elements using server\\-side rendering.
* Develop user interfaces with modern front\\-end technologies such as React.js, TypeScript, and JavaScript.
* Create and maintain scalable backend services using Node.js and MongoDB.
* Creating and maintaining databases, particularly MongoDB, and ensuring high performance, responsiveness, and scalability.
* Implementing automated testing platforms and unit tests using Cypress for front\\-end and back\\-end systems.
* Design and develop high\\-quality technical solutions using Terraform, AWS services, and best practices in Networking and IAM
* Managing infrastructure as code using Terraform for efficient provisioning and management of cloud resource
* Build and maintain scalable and secure AWS infrastructure utilizing Terraform, AWS IAM, API Gateway, Lambda, and S3 services
* Design, develop, and maintain scalable full stack applications utilizing AWS cloud services.
* Implement security and compliance best practices, particularly in AWS IAM to ensure secure access control and identity management.
* Leverage AWS API Gateway for building and managing secure, scalable APIs for applications.
* Develop serverless applications using AWS Lambda for efficient and cost\\-effective computing.
* Utilize AWS S3 for scalable storage solutions and integration with other AWS services



  





**Qualifications \\& Skills:** 




  




* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
* Minimum of 5 years work experience as a Full Stack Software Engineer or similar role.
* Proven hands\\-on experience in developing and deploying web applications using technologies including Node.js, React.js, TypeScript, JavaScript, Cypress, MongoDB, Terraform and AWS.
* Experience in building highly performant applications with a micro\\-services architecture.
* In\\-depth understanding of AWS IAM best practices and security protocols.
* Hands\\-on experience with AWS API Gateway, AWS Lambda, and AWS S3\\.
* Strong understanding of software development principles, design patterns, and best practices.
* Expertise in integrating and consuming RESTful web services and APIs.
* Experience in building highly performant applications with a micro\\-services architecture.
* Experience with cloud platforms, particularly AWS, for building and deploying scalable applications. AWS certification(s) is a plus.
* Strong understanding and hands\\-on experience with Terraform for infrastructure as code
* Experience with managing cloud infrastructure
* Proficiency with version control systems such as Git, and CI/CD pipelines.
* Experience with assessing software security and potential risk factors
* Experience with incident response, disaster recovery and on\\-call processes
* Solid knowledge of database design, optimization, and performance tuning.
* Strong testing knowledge, understands what should be tested when and at what level to provide maximum efficiency.
* Working experience in a AGILE environment will be a plus.



  





**Abilities \\& Competencies:** 



* Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
* Strategic thinking and problem\\-solving abilities.
* Ability to work effectively in a fast\\-paced environment and meet deadlines.
* Proven leadership and management skills with the ability to develop, communicate and inspire staff.
* Takes accountability and has a strong sense of ownership.
* Results oriented and a commitment to high quality customer service.
* Ability to lead a team/discipline to quickly resolve complex problems in the provision of Digital Services.
* Ability to work in an agile environment and adapt to changing requirements and collaborating effectively with distributed teams.

title: Full-Stack Development  Tech Lead
description:
**Full\\-Stack Development Tech Lead** 




  





 Must Have Skills:
 **full stack development, backend engineering, frontend frameworks, SQL/NoSQL databases, and solution design** 




  





 Location : Hyderabad \\- WFO
 



 NP :30 days
 



 Experience : 3 to 6 yrs
 



 Budget : Max 15 LPA
 



  





**Client : Aptagrim Limited** 




  





 JD :
 



 Tech Lead
 



 Experience: 3‚Äì6 years
 



 Location: Hyderabad
 



 Type: Full\\-time
 



  





 About the Role
 



 We are looking for a strong hands\\-on Tech Lead who can own the technical execution
 



 across multiple products and client projects. The ideal candidate should be strong in full
 



 stack development, backend engineering, frontend frameworks, SQL/NoSQL databases,
 



 and solution design, while also understanding business context and user needs.
 



 This role requires someone who can bridge technology \\+ product, convert business
 



 requirements into technical tasks, work with Project/Product Managers, and guide developers
 



 to deliver high\\-quality solutions.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




 1\\.
 **Technical Leadership \\& Ownership** 




 ‚Ä¢ Lead end\\-to\\-end development across projects.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Own architecture decisions for modules/components.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Review code, enforce best practices, and ensure maintainable, scalable solutions.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Provide technical direction to junior developers and ensure efficient delivery.
 



  





 2\\.
 **Full\\-Stack Development** 




 ‚Ä¢ Hands\\-on development using modern frameworks (React/Angular/Next,
 



 Node.js/Java, Python or similar).
 



 ‚Ä¢ Build robust backend APIs, services, and integrations.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Develop responsive front\\-end interfaces with a strong focus on usability and
 



 performance.
 



  





 3\\.
 **Database \\& Storage Design** 




 ‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge on SQL databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL) ‚Äî schema design,
 



 indexing, optimisation.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge on NoSQL (MongoDB, Redis, DynamoDB, Firestore) depending
 



 on project needs.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Design efficient data models for high\\-volume applications.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Implement backup, migration, and performance strategies.
 



  





 4\\.
 **Architecture \\& System Design** 




 ‚Ä¢ Implement loosely\\-coupled, scalable architectures.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Break down large requirements into components and microservices where needed.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Make choices around caching, queues, logging, API logic, event\\-driven architecture.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Ensure application reliability, fault tolerance, and performance tuning.
 



  





 5\\.
 **Product \\& Business Understanding** 




 ‚Ä¢ Strong ability to understand business workflows and user journeys.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Participate in requirement discussions with clients, PMs, and stakeholders.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Add value by suggesting improvements, optimisations, or missing scenarios.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Ensure each feature aligns with user expectations and business logic.
 



  





 6\\.
 **Project Collaboration \\& Delivery** 




 ‚Ä¢ Work closely with Project Managers/Product Managers to define priorities.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Estimate efforts, identify risks, and ensure realistic planning.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Manage technical scope across multiple projects in parallel.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Support with release planning, deployment coordination, and quality checks.
 



  





 7\\.
 **Quality, Security \\& Best Practices** 




 ‚Ä¢ Ensure code quality, documentation, and adherence to standards.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Promote secure coding practices and follow OWASP basics.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Maintain clean environment setups and branching strategies (Git).
 



 ‚Ä¢ Own CI/CD readiness (even if DevOps team executes it).
 



  





 8\\.
 **Soft Skills \\& Leadership** 




 ‚Ä¢ Excellent communication with clients and internal stakeholders
 



 ‚Ä¢ Ability to guide, mentor, and unblock developers
 



 ‚Ä¢ Strong business awareness; ability to refine user stories
 



 ‚Ä¢ Ownership mindset; ability to balance speed and quality
 



 ‚Ä¢ Comfortable handling multiple projects without losing clarity

title: Assistant Manager_Amdocs CRM6/ CSM, Shell Scripting,Pl/Sql,Core Java-L2 Support_Pune
description:
Who we are
   

  

 VOIS (Vodafone Intelligent Solutions) is a strategic arm of Vodafone Group Plc, creating value for customers by delivering intelligent solutions through Talent, Technology \\& Transformation.
   

  

 As the largest shared services organisation in the global telco industry with 30,000 FTE, our portfolio of next\\-generation solutions and services are designed in partnership with customers across Vodafone Group, local markets, and partner markets to simplify and drive growth. With our strategic partner Accenture, we work alongside our Vodafone customers, other Telco and tech companies to drive transformation, meet the challenges of our industry and ensure we stay relevant and resilient. This partnership is a unique, industry\\-first model which brings together the best of in\\-house and 3rd party capability.
   

  

 We work with customers across 28 countries from 10 VOIS locations: Albania, Egypt, Hungary, India, Romania, Spain, Turkey, UK, Germany, Ireland, and with a network of teams in Czech Republic, Italy, Greece, and Portugal.
   

  

 \\#VOIS \\#BeUnrivalled \\#CreateTheFuture
   

  

**About This Role**
 We are seeking an experienced Amdocs Application Support Specialist to join our Operations team in Pune. This role is focused on providing Level 2 support for the Amdocs CRM6 application within the Vodafone project. The individual will be responsible for resolving operational issues, conducting code reviews, and ensuring application stability through proactive troubleshooting. The role requires rotational shift work and on\\-call support, making it ideal for someone with a flexible approach and strong problem\\-solving skills.
   

  

 What you will do
   

  

* Provide Level 2 support for Amdocs CRM6 applications
* Troubleshoot and resolve operational issues efficiently
* Conduct application code reviews to identify and fix defects
* Collaborate effectively within a team and contribute independently
* Participate in rotational shifts and on\\-call support schedules


 Who you are
   

  

* 2‚Äì5 years of experience in application support
* Strong knowledge of Amdocs CRM6/CSM, CSM/Ensemble
* Proficient in Core Java and SQL/PLSQL
* Demonstrates clear, solution\\-oriented thinking and effective communication
* Open\\-minded and committed to maintaining high service standards


 Not a Perfect Fit?
   

  

 Concerned you may not meet every requirement? Vodafone is committed to creating an inclusive workplace where everyone can thrive. If you are excited about this role but your experience does not align exactly with every aspect of the job description, you are encouraged to apply. You may be the right candidate for this or another opportunity, and the recruitment team will support you in exploring where your skills fit best.
   

  

 What‚Äôs in it for you
   

  

* Opportunity to work on a high\\-impact Vodafone project
* Exposure to enterprise\\-grade CRM systems and technologies
* Collaborative work environment with rotational shift flexibility
* Skill development through hands\\-on troubleshooting and code reviews
* Experience in a global shared services organisation


**What Skills You Will Learn**
* Advanced application support methodologies
* Deep technical understanding of Amdocs CRM6 and Core Java, CSM, Ensemble
* SQL/PLSQL optimisation and debugging techniques
* Effective communication and cross\\-functional collaboration
* Incident management and on\\-call operational readiness


 VOIS Equal Opportunity Employer Commitment
   

  

 Vodafone recognises and celebrates the value of diversity in building a workforce that reflects the customers and communities it serves. No form of discrimination is tolerated. This includes, but is not limited to, discrimination based on race, colour, age, veteran status, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, pregnancy, maternity or parental status, ethnicity, disability, religion or belief, political affiliation, trade union membership, nationality, citizenship, indigenous status, medical condition, HIV status, neurodiversity, social origin, cultural background, marital or civil partnership status, or socio\\-economic background.
   

  

 Join Us
   

  

 At Vodafone, we‚Äôre working hard to build a better future. A more connected, inclusive and sustainable world. As a dynamic global community, it's our human spirit, together with technology, that empowers us to achieve this.
   

  

 We challenge and innovate in order to connect people, businesses, and communities across the world. Delighting our customers and earning their loyalty drive us, and we experiment, learn fast and get it done, together.
   

  

 With us, you can be truly be yourself and belong, share inspiration, embrace new opportunities, thrive, and make a real difference.
   

  

 Alert
   

  

 Apply for Vodafone jobs only through the official Vodafone Careers website to avoid job scams and fraud.
   

  

 \\#JDEnhancedByTARA
   

  

 Follow us on social media and \\#StayConnected
   

  

* LinkedIn
* Facebook
* Instagram
* Chat with our employees

title: PCC Collections Infrastructure Engineer
description:
**Job Title** 
 : PCC Collections Infrastructure Engineer
 



 Experience: 4 Years

**Role Overview** 




 We are seeking a PCC Collections Infrastructure Engineer with hands\\-on experience in managing deployments, automations, and environment support for PCC\\-based solutions. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of PCC components, non\\-production environments, batch workflow management, and automation scripting.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




 Deployment \\& Environment Management

 PCC Platform Knowledge

title: Aspt.net c#
description:
**Company Description**
  

 SK Vision Placement is a leading recruitment consultancy that emphasizes the importance of people as the foundation of organizational success. Based in Morbi, Gujarat, the company has grown to become a top recruitment provider in the region. Serving clients across India, SK Vision Placement caters to industries such as Mining, Petrochemical, Power, Manufacturing, and Retail. The company is dedicated to matching talent with opportunities, providing workforce solutions for temporary, contract, and permanent roles.
   

  

**Role Description**
  

 This is a full\\-time, on\\-site role for an ASP.NET C\\# Developer located in Vapi. Responsibilities include designing, developing, and maintaining web applications using ASP.NET and C\\#. The developer will work on coding, debugging, and troubleshooting software components while collaborating with team members to ensure technical solutions meet business requirements. Additional responsibilities include system testing, documentation, and optimizing performance to enhance application functionality.
   

  

**Qualifications**
  

* Proficiency in ASP.NET framework and C\\# programming
* Experience with web development, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and database interactions
* Strong debugging, troubleshooting, and problem\\-solving skills
* Familiarity with software development lifecycle and software testing
* Ability to work in an on\\-site, team\\-oriented environment
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
* Knowledge of RESTful APIs and modern web application architecture is a plus

title: Software Engineer - Data Management - S&P Global
description:
****About the Role:****
**Grade Level (for internal use):**
 10
   

  

**The Role:**
**Full Stack Java Developer**
 Your mission is to design, create and maintain our backend applications that power our strategic metadata platform. You possess a profound knowledge of core Java , appreciation for the value of metadata enabling governance and quality and have a preference for creating frameworks rather than utilizing existing ones.
   

  

**The Team**
 The Distribution \\& Data Platforms development team consists of passionate individuals who thrive on innovation and collaboration. We're responsible for distributing data and metadata to clients , both internal and external . Our distribution platform is widely used within the company and serves many external clients. We value creativity, adaptability, and a commitment to excellence. Our team's unique blend of technical expertise and business acumen sets us apart.
   

  

**The Impact**
 Delivering data to clients in a timely manner is key to the success of the company. As a software engineer, you will focus on reliability, performance and scalability. This role offers a unique opportunity to work on a high\\-impact project. The successful customer and data onboarding tools will be closely watched by stakeholders, executives, and clients.
   

  

**What's In It For You**
* Professional Growth : You'll have the opportunity to join a high\\-performing team, growing your technical skills, and contribute to strategic decisions.
* Global Exposure : Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams across different geographies, gaining exposure to diverse perspectives and markets.
* Innovation : Shape the future of data integration by working on cutting\\-edge technologies and solving complex challenges.


**Responsibilities**
 You will work as part of a development team that designs, builds and maintains high performant and maintainable code. It is a unique and challenging role that calls for a strong passion for quality and technology, while providing an immense opportunity to design and develop wide reaching code.
   

  

 The role includes work on architecture design, business logic, requirements gathering, data modelling and quality assurance.
   

  

 If you rather build frameworks instead of using them, this is the role for you!
   

  

**What We're Looking For**
 We are looking for creative people with a passion for programming and an eye for detail.
   

  

* A recognized academic background in Computer Science
* Solid experience with Java 21\\-23 and/or Kotlin
* Experience with building multi\\-threading and concurrent systems
* Solid understanding of concurrency and distributed architectures
* Experience with test\\-driven development
* If you prefer using frameworks instead of building them, this role is not for you.


**What's In It For** 
**You?**
**Our Mission:**
 Advancing Essential Intelligence.
   

  

**Our People:**
 We're more than 35,000 strong worldwide\\-so we're able to understand nuances while having a broad perspective. Our team is driven by curiosity and a shared belief that Essential Intelligence can help build a more prosperous future for us all.From finding new ways to measure sustainability to analyzing energy transition across the supply chain to building workflow solutions that make it easy to tap into insight and apply it. We are changing the way people see things and empowering them to make an impact on the world we live in. We're committed to a more equitable future and to helping our customers find new, sustainable ways of doing business. Join us and help create the critical insights that truly make a difference.
   

  

**Our Values:**
**Integrity, Discovery, Partnership**
 Throughout our history, the world's leading organizations have relied on us for the Essential Intelligence they need to make confident decisions about the road ahead. We start with a foundation of integrity in all we do, bring a spirit of discovery to our work, and collaborate in close partnership with each other and our customers to achieve shared goals.
   

  

**Benefits:**
 We take care of you, so you can take care of business. We care about our people. That's why we provide everything you\\-and your career\\-need to thrive at S\\&P Global.
   

  

 Our benefits include:
   

  

* Health \\& Wellness: Health care coverage designed for the mind and body.
* Flexible Downtime: Generous time off helps keep you energized for your time on.
* Continuous Learning: Access a wealth of resources to grow your career and learn valuable new skills.
* Invest in Your Future: Secure your financial future through competitive pay, retirement planning, a continuing education program with a company\\-matched student loan contribution, and financial wellness programs.
* Family Friendly Perks: It's not just about you. S\\&P Global has perks for your partners and little ones, too, with some best\\-in class benefits for families.
* Beyond the Basics: From retail discounts to referral incentive awards\\-small perks can make a big difference.


 For more information on benefits by country visit: https://spgbenefits.com/benefit\\-summaries
   

  

**Global Hiring and Opportunity at S\\&P Global:**
 At S\\&P Global, we are committed to fostering a connected and engaged workplace where all individuals have access to opportunities based on their skills, experience, and contributions. Our hiring practices emphasize fairness, transparency, and merit, ensuring that we attract and retain top talent. By valuing different perspectives and promoting a culture of respect and collaboration, we drive innovation and power global markets.
   

  

**Recruitment Fraud Alert:**
 If you receive an email from a spglobalind.com domain or any other regionally based domains, it is a scam and should be reported to reportfraud@spglobal.com . S\\&P Global never requires any candidate to pay money for job applications, interviews, offer letters, "pre\\-employment training" or for equipment/delivery of equipment. Stay informed and protect yourself from recruitment fraud by reviewing our guidelines, fraudulent domains, and how to report suspicious activity here .
   

  

**Equal Opportunity Employer**
 S\\&P Global is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race/ethnicity, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, marital status, military veteran status, unemployment status, or any other status protected by law. Only electronic job submissions will be considered for employment.
   

  

 If you need an accommodation during the application process due to a disability, please send an email to: EEO.Compliance@spglobal.com and your request will be forwarded to the appropriate person.
   

  

**US Candidates Only:** 
 The EEO is the Law Poster http://www.dol.gov/ofccp/regs/compliance/posters/pdf/eeopost.pdf describes discrimination protections under federal law. Pay Transparency Nondiscrimination Provision \\- https://www.dol.gov/sites/dolgov/files/ofccp/pdf/pay\\-transp\\_%20English\\_formattedESQA508c.pdf
   

  

 20 \\- Professional (EEO\\-2 Job Categories\\-United States of America), IFTECH202\\.1 \\- Middle Professional Tier I (EEO Job Group), SWP Priority \\- Ratings \\- (Strategic Workforce Planning)

title: Founding Team Build
description:
**Founding Team ‚Äì India \\| High\\-Growth U.S. Sales \\& Growth Platform** 




**Company:** 
 Revenue Optics
 



**Location:** 
 India (Remote\\-Work from Home)
 



**Type:** 
 Full\\-Time
 



**Hiring Window:** 
 45\\-Day Selection Period
 



**Time Zone Requirement:** 
 Daily overlap with U.S. Eastern Time
 



  





**About Revenue Optics** 




 Revenue Optics is a
 **U.S.\\-based sales transformation and growth engineering firm** 
 serving B2B distributors and private\\-equity\\-backed industrial companies.
 



 We design and implement:
 


* Inside sales and outbound coverage models
* Revenue operations and CRM architecture
* Sales analytics and executive dashboards
* AI\\-enabled sales automation
* Go\\-to\\-market strategy and segmentation
* Sales, RevOps, and analytics team build\\-outs



 Our clients operate at
 **real enterprise scale** 
 with urgent commercial mandates: accelerate organic growth, improve sales productivity, and modernize revenue infrastructure.
 



 We are now entering a
 **major scale phase** 
 and are building our
 **founding execution team in India** 
 to support delivery across consulting, data, RevOps, automation, and strategy.
 



  





**Who This Role Is For** 




 This opportunity is designed for:
 


* High\\-performing early\\-career professionals who have already built real systems or products
* Mid\\-career operators who feel underutilized in slow, hierarchical environments
* Builders who want
 **global exposure, faster responsibility, and direct linkage to business outcomes**



  





 This is not a narrow single\\-role posting.
 



 It is a
 **general founding team build across multiple functional tracks** 
 .
 



**If You‚Äôve Been Passed Over, This Is Your Reset** 




 This role will resonate if you have ever:
 


* Been passed over because of
 **politics instead of performance**
* Been boxed in by
 **tenure\\-based promotion systems**
* Been slowed down by
 **layers of management and approval cycles**
* Consistently outperformed peers without receiving real scope or authority



  





 Many high\\-caliber operators become
 **caged talent** 
 in traditional organizations‚Äîcapable of far more than their title or environment allows. Here, there is no political ladder to climb.
 



 There is only
 **execution, impact, and accountability** 
 .
 



 If you‚Äôve ever felt like you were built for more‚Äîbut never truly got your shot‚Äî
 **this is that shot.** 




  





**What You‚Äôll Work On** 




 Depending on your background, you may contribute across:
 


* üìä Data \\& Analytics ‚Äì reporting, KPI frameworks, SQL/Python pipelines, executive dashboards
* ‚öôÔ∏è Revenue Operations ‚Äì CRM architecture, funnel design, GTM workflows
* ü§ñ Automation \\& AI ‚Äì sales automation, copilots, workflow orchestration
* üß† Strategy \\& Market Intelligence ‚Äì segmentation, ICP modeling, whitespace analysis
* üé® Creative \\& Client Enablement ‚Äì presentations, sales tools, storytelling systems
* üöÄ Execution \\& Operations ‚Äì implementation, client delivery, internal systems



  





 All work is:
 


* Client\\-facing
* Outcome\\-driven
* Tied directly to revenue, productivity, or growth performance



  





**Why This Is a High\\-Acceleration Opportunity** 



* You will work directly with
 **U.S.\\-based senior operators and former enterprise executives**
* You will gain exposure to:
* Private equity portfolio environments
* National distributor growth strategies
* Modern sales and RevOps architectures
* Your work will be deployed across
 **multiple real client environments**
* Growth is
 **performance\\-based, not tenure\\-based**



  





**Here, output outranks tenure. Performance creates authority‚Äîfast.** 




**Execution speaks louder than credentials. If you can build, you belong‚Äîdegree or not.** 




**Time Zone \\& Availability (Non\\-Negotiable)** 




 You must be able to:
 


* Maintain daily overlap with U.S. Eastern Time
* Work live with U.S. clients and leadership
* Support real\\-time execution and delivery



**What You‚Äôll Be Accountable For** 



* Owning deliverables end\\-to\\-end
* Turning ambiguity into execution
* Shipping high\\-quality work under real deadlines
* Tying your work to business outcomes (revenue, efficiency, adoption, margin)
* Operating with high autonomy and accountability



  





**Core Expectations** 




**Across all tracks:** 



* Extreme ownership
* Bias toward action
* Clear written communication
* Comfort working with minimal hand\\-holding
* High personal performance standards



**Functional experience may include (not all required):** 



* Data: SQL, Python, Power BI, analytics engineering
* RevOps: CRM, GTM systems, routing, reporting
* Automation: APIs, workflows, AI copilots
* Strategy: segmentation, ICP modeling, business analysis
* Creative: Figma, presentation systems, visual storytelling



  





**What This Is Not** 




 This is not a fit for:
 


* Candidates seeking rigid schedules
* People who require heavy task\\-level management
* Those optimizing primarily for low\\-pressure environments
* Anyone unable to commit to U.S. Eastern Time overlap



  





**Recent Graduates \\& Interns** 




 We do consider exceptional early\\-career talent.
 



 Formal education matters less than
 **demonstrated execution** 
 . You should be able to show:
 


* Products you built
* Dashboards you shipped
* Automations you deployed
* Freelance or startup work
* Revenue or operational impact



 If your experience is limited to coursework only, this role is likely not the right fit at this time.
 



  





**45\\-Day Hiring Window** 




 This is a
 **general call for elite talent** 
 .
 



 We will be actively reviewing candidates over the next
 **45 days** 
 as we prepare for a significant team build\\-out. This is not a single hire‚Äîthis is a
 **founding cohort expansion** 
 .

title: Senior ITSM Developer
description:
Role: Senior ITSM Developer
 



 Desired Experience Range: 5\\-10 Years
 



 Location: PAN INDIA
 



 Job Description
 



 ‚Ä¢ Experience as a ServiceNow ITSM Developer and Implementing Incident Management, Problem Management, Change Management, Knowledge Management, or Service Catalog, Mobile App, Virtual Agent
 



 ‚Ä¢ Ability to configure ServiceNow ITSM applications in alignment with approved design plans
 



 ‚Ä¢ Working knowledge of web applications, networks, protocols and email
 



 ‚Ä¢ Provides detailed technical architecture analysis, design and direction on development activities
 



 ‚Ä¢ Experienced in creating ServiceNow forms, Designing/Configuring Workflow, flow designer and customizing applications.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Well versed in facilitating roll out of new applications and modules in ServiceNow.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Very good experience in ServiceNow Client Script, business rules, script include, UI Actions, UI Policies, Data Policies, Catalog items.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Experience in integrating tools in ServiceNow.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Experienced in ServiceNow technical configuration, and development of reports and dashboards.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Good in support activities of ServiceNow to identify issues within the code, working collaboratively with other team members.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Building relationships with business partners through analysis, evaluating best practice and aligning technology to solve their issues and improve efficiencies.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Bringing proficient methodologies and best approaches to non\\-traditional aspects of technology delivery.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Knowledge of ITSM processes such as Change, Incident management, Problem Management, SLA and Service Request Management
 



 ‚Ä¢ Experience in creating new Workflows and modifying the existing workflows according to new requirements in an efficient manner.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Experience in Enhancing the ServiceNow functionality by customized JavaScript code to support the new business needs.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Experience in creating scripts like Client Scripts, Catalog Client Scripts, background script, Fix script and UI Policies, UI action.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Hands\\-on experience in Client and Server\\-side Scripting.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Ability to communicate with technical individuals, including knowledge at a deep enough level to understand the underlying technical concepts.
 



 Well\\-spoken in front of groups, including the ability to prepare and make presentations to senior management.
 



  





 Good\\-to\\-Have
 



 ‚Ä¢ ServiceNow Implementation Specialist certification
 



 ‚Ä¢ ITIL V3/V4 foundation certification
 



 ‚Ä¢ Java developer certification
 


-

title: ServiceNow SPM Developer
description:
Role: ServiceNow SPM Developer
 



 Desired Experience Range: 5\\-10 Years
 



 Location: PAN INDIA
 



 Job Description
 



 Must Have Technical/Functional Skills
 



 ‚Ä¢ ServiceNow Development
 



 ‚Ä¢ ServiceNow Integrations
 



 ‚Ä¢ ServiceNow Certified ServiceNow Administrator (CSA)
 



 ‚Ä¢ ServiceNow Certified Application Developer (CAD)
 



 Experience Required
 



 ‚Ä¢ Implementation of SPM Modules in ServiceNow for at least 1 program.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Implementation experience using Now Platform, Service Portal, Next UI Framework, Integration Hub
 



 ‚Ä¢ Experience in Web Services like SOAP and REST to link ServiceNow with existing tools in a network
 



 ‚Ä¢ Experience in building integration with SAP ECC 6 and S/4 Hana using Integration HUB spokes and BTP
 



 ‚Ä¢ Hands on experience on Flow Designer, UI Builder, Virtual Agent, Service Catalog / Record Producer, Flow Designer
 



 ‚Ä¢ Extensive experience in Integrating ServiceNow with other systems using custom developed \\& Integration Hub spokes
 



 ‚Ä¢ Workflow Automation using workflow, Document Feeds, email, Scheduled Script Executions, and Events
 



 ‚Ä¢ Good knowledge of Glide API that is used with JavaScript to implement advanced features in ServiceNow.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Implemented Access Control using ACL as well as Query Business Rules.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Implemented complex processes in ServiceNow using workflows and flow designer
 



 ‚Ä¢ Generating and scheduling reports and creating homepages to showcase Key Performance Indicators.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Expertise in client and server side scripting using components such as Client Scripts, Business Rules, Script Includes
 



 ‚Ä¢ Configuration of alerts via e\\-mail and SMS services, to keep the users updated
 



 Roles \\& Responsibilities
 



 ‚Ä¢ Requirement gathering
 



 ‚Ä¢ Designing \\& Implementing ServiceNow applications \\- Service Portals, Integration Hub/Custom Integrations
 



 ‚Ä¢ Creation of High level and Low\\-level designs
 



 ‚Ä¢ Helping development team during implementation, testing \\& roll out
 



 ‚Ä¢ Troubleshooting and fixing issues
 



 ‚Ä¢ Workflow Automation using workflow, Document Feeds, email, Scheduled Script Executions, and Events

title: Senior MLOps Engineer
description:
Role \\& Responsibilities
   

  

 We are looking for a Senior MLOps Engineer with 8\\+ years of experience building and managing production\\-grade ML platforms and pipelines. The ideal candidate will have strong expertise across AWS, Airflow/MWAA, Apache Spark, Kubernetes (EKS), and automation of ML lifecycle workflows. You will work closely with data science, data engineering, and platform teams to operationalize and scale ML models in production.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design and manage cloud\\-native ML platforms supporting training, inference, and model lifecycle automation.
* Build ML/ETL pipelines using Apache Airflow / AWS MWAA and distributed data workflows using Apache Spark (EMR/Glue).
* Containerize and deploy ML workloads using Docker, EKS, ECS/Fargate, and Lambda.
* Develop CI/CT/CD pipelines integrating model validation, automated training, testing, and deployment.
* Implement ML observability: model drift, data drift, performance monitoring, and alerting using CloudWatch, Grafana, Prometheus.
* Ensure data governance, versioning, metadata tracking, reproducibility, and secure data pipelines.
* Collaborate with data scientists to productionize notebooks, experiments, and model deployments.


 Ideal Candidate
   

  

* 8\\+ years in MLOps/DevOps with strong ML pipeline experience.
* Strong hands\\-on experience with AWS:
* Compute/Orchestration: EKS, ECS, EC2, Lambda
* Data: EMR, Glue, S3, Redshift, RDS, Athena, Kinesis
* Workflow: MWAA/Airflow, Step Functions
* Monitoring: CloudWatch, OpenSearch, Grafana
* Strong Python skills and familiarity with ML frameworks (TensorFlow/PyTorch/Scikit\\-learn).
* Expertise with Docker, Kubernetes, Git, CI/CD tools (GitHub Actions/Jenkins).
* Strong Linux, scripting, and troubleshooting skills.
* Experience enabling reproducible ML environments using Jupyter Hub and containerized development workflows.


**Education**
* Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Data Engineering, or related field.


 Perks, Benefits and Work Culture
   

  

* Competitive Salary Package
* Generous Leave Policy
* Flexible Working Hours
* Performance\\-Based Bonuses
* Health Care Benefits


 Skills: ml,cd,apache spark,pipelines,apache,data,automation,airflow,aws,mlops,ci
